subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ decision not to trade for Johan Santana may have cost them a spot in the 2008 playoffs, but it enabled them to sign C.C. Sabathia a year later.
snippet: The Yankees’ decision not to trade for Johan Santana may have cost them a spot in the 2008 playoffs, but it enabled them to sign C.C. Sabathia a year later.
